title: Persist Drive auth + auto-save progress
message:
Persist Google Drive auth state and auto-save deck progress from the game summary. Changes include:

- Add persisted zustand drive store (accessToken, tokenExpiry) with setAccessToken and isAuthorized handling; persist appFolderId, deckFileIds, accessToken and tokenExpiry.
- Update initGis to pass token expiry (expires_in) to callbacks.
- Restore Google session on sign-in if a valid persisted token exists and set gapi token accordingly; update sign-in flow to store access token and expiry.
- Add auto-save in GameSummary: when authorized and a deck file mapping exists, save current cards to Drive via saveFile and show a syncStatus message in the UI.

These changes allow the app to maintain Drive authorization between sessions and automatically persist user progress to the corresponding deck file.
